All Implemented Interfaces:
Handler
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChunkingHandler, InternetDiscovery, LocalNetworkDiscovery, MessagesThroughputHandler, MessageToMessageCodec, Monitoring, SimpleDuplexRemoteEnvelopeSkipLoopbackHandler, TcpClient
public abstract class SimpleDuplexHandler<I,O,A extends Address> extends SimpleDuplexEventAwareHandler<I,Event,O,A>
HandlerAdapter which allows to explicit only handle a specific type of messages and events.
